statements: SELECT * FROM LoanApprovalProcess ORDER BY customer_name DESC, income ASC
SELECT customer_name, credit_score FROM LoanApprovalProcess WHERE credit_score > 700
SELECT customer_id, income FROM LoanApprovalProcess WHERE income BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000
SELECT * FROM LoanApprovalProcess WHERE financial_history LIKE '%bad%'
SELECT customer_name, credit_score, financial_history FROM LoanApprovalProcess WHERE financial_history IS NOT NULL
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, credit_score, income, financial_history FROM LoanApprovalProcess;
SELECT * FROM LoanApprovalProcess WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, income FROM LoanApprovalProcess WHERE financial_history LIKE '%bad%';
SELECT * FROM LoanApprovalProcess ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT customer_name, credit_score FROM LoanApprovalProcess WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY credit_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, credit_score FROM customers ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT customer_name, income FROM customers WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT customer_name, financial_history FROM customers WHERE financial_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, credit_score, income FROM customers ORDER BY income ASC, credit_score DESC;
SELECT customer_name, credit_score FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, income FROM customers WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customer_name, financial_history FROM customers WHERE LENGTH(financial_history) > 100;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE approval_status = 'APPROVED';
SELECT customer_name, credit_score, amount, interest_rate FROM customers JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY interest_rate DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerCreditScores;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM CustomerCreditScores WHERE credit_score >= 700;
SELECT customer_id, income FROM CustomerIncome ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT customer_id, financial_history FROM CustomerFinancialHistory WHERE financial_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, income FROM CustomerCreditScores JOIN CustomerIncome ON CustomerCreditScores.customer_id = CustomerIncome.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerCreditScores WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, income FROM CustomerIncome WHERE income BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY income ASC;
SELECT customer_id, financial_history FROM CustomerFinancialHistory WHERE financial_history LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;

SELECT cc.customer_id, ci.income, cf.financial_history FROM CustomerCreditScores cc JOIN CustomerIncome ci ON cc.customer_id = ci.customer_id JOIN CustomerFinancialHistory cf ON cc.customer_id = cf.customer_id WHERE cc.credit_score > 650 AND ci.income > 75000 AND cf.financial_history = 'excellent' ORDER BY ci.income DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerCreditScores WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM CustomerFinancialHistory WHERE financial_history NOT LIKE '%bad%') ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, credit_score FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, income FROM customers ORDER BY income DESC
SELECT approval_status, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE approval_status = 'approved'
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customer_name, income FROM customers WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount < 10000 AND approval_status = 'approved';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(loan_id) AS num_loans FROM loans GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_loans > 2;

SELECT customers.customer_name, loans.loan_amount, payments.payment_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id INNER JOIN payments ON loans.loan_id = payments.loan_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, income FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, employment_status FROM customers ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE approval_status = 'approved';
SELECT customer_id, employer, job_title FROM employment WHERE employment_status = 'full-time';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT first_name, last_name, income FROM customers WHERE income >= 5000.00 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT customers.first_name, loans.loan_id, loans.approved_amount FROM customers JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id;
SELECT customers.first_name, employment.employer, employment.job_title FROM customers JOIN employment ON customers.customer_id = employment.customer_id WHERE employment_status = 'Employed';
SELECT customers.first_name, addresses.city, addresses.state FROM customers JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id ORDER BY addresses.state, addresses.city DESC;
